name: Three Miles High
description:
An all-expenses-paid company trip to the tropics?  Sign me up!

But of course, there's always a catch.  This prime real estate has been acquired by the higher-ups and scouted as the ideal location for a new renewable energy initiative, and you are just the person for the job of overseer!

Make sure to respect the environment, meet your quotas, and treat your team well.  And, look.  If you have to slip a reactor or two into your project to meet those unreasonable targets, well - nobody has to know.
